name: Scare Your Nightmares
description:
This is my first time making a horror game, I'm pretty happy with it but obviously not the best. In the game there's short dialogue, some environment to move in, and scaring nightmares away from you.

Controls:

ESCQuit the GameWWalk ForwardAWalk to the LeftSWalk BackwardsDWalk to the RightFTurn Flashlight On/Off
ETurn Deathlight On/OffSpacebarClose/Open Your Eyes


Game Developer:

Sean173

SFX Artist:

Nddaso

Music:

Anxiety - Kevin Macleod

Deep Noise - Kevin Macleod

Measured Paces - Kevin Macleod
